settings.title: DOUGLAS PEREIRA SKIN SCIENCE
settings.subtitle: An uncomplicated skincare collection, with complex formulations, for everyday people

settings.title: DOUGLAS PEREIRA SKIN SCIENCE
settings.text:
Douglas Pereira Skin Science is an uncomplicated skincare collection, with complex formulations, for everyday people.

Twelve years after founding our premium skincare range Douglas Pereira Skin Health we have launched our new range Douglas Pereira Skin Science. This collection of products came from a need Douglas saw in the market, where some skincare consumers don’t want to have a complicated skincare routine, but still wanted to get most out of a few steps.

The range is a straightforward collection of products that has been developed for all genders and skin types. Our universal formulations offer all in one skincare solutions for those not wanting a complicated homecare regime, but still striving for result driven skincare without too many steps.

settings.title: CORE COLLECTION
settings.text:
The core product collection is your everyday routine and has been formulated to suite all skin types, eliminating the challenge of choosing the right products for your skin.

The system is straightforward and has minimal steps, so you don’t have to invest too much time looking after your skin but can have the confidence all bases

settings.title: AN UNCOMPLICATED APPROACH
settings.text:
The range has been divided into three collections making it easy for you to navigate and select your products.

Core, Supportive and Enhancement collections.
